summary:
After experiencing Agile development at Pivotal (VMware Tanzu Labs), I launched the Agile development office at Fujitsu.
Tech leading of agile development team for trading system(CONNEQTOR) of Tokyo Stock Exchange. Lead the first agile development project for Tokyo Stock Exchange and also the first project with Microsoft Azure for the company.
Operated and developed new functions for a timely disclosure system(TDnet) of the Tokyo Stock Exchange.  As lead engineer, managed cost and schedule, design reviews and code reviews.
Operated and maintained the on-premise infrastructure of the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Managed network switches and virtual machines for more than 10 information systems at TSE.
Developed a timely disclosure system(TDnet) for the Tokyo Stock Exchange.  Designed, developed and tested the search feature for disclosure documents.

Developed an iOS-based telemedicine system.
The service was launched after a pilot project at a hospital in the Kumamoto-Aso area.
